data.title: Flights to Spain – Book Your Ticket Easily Today
data.meta_description: Find your flight to Spain with SAS here. Discover price-worthy tickets and enjoy comfortable flights. Book your trip easily today »
data.text:
SAS flies to Spain from/via Oslo, Copenhagen or Stockholm nd offers flights to Alicante, Barcelona, Ibiza, Las Palmas, Malaga, Palma de Mallorca, Seville and Tenerife. We fly to most of our destinations all year round. A few of our destinations are seasonal.

We fly from all our destinations in Europe, the US (Atlanta, Boston, Chicago, Los Angeles, Miami, New York, San Francisco and Washington D.C.), Canada (Toronto), and Asia (Bangkok, Tokyo and Shanghai).

Fly to Spain – Visit the Pablo Picasso museum in Malaga

Pablo Picasso was born in Malaga, the capital of Costa del Sol, and he is present all over the city. The Picasso museum, founded in 2003, is home to more than 200 paintings, drawings, sculptures etc.

You might also want to visit the house where the famous painter was born while you’re in Malaga. You’ll find both his work and other mementos here.

Explore Palma de Mallorca

Are you looking for nature, peace and quiet – and party? Look no further. Mallorca will show you turquoise water and golden beaches, mountains, hidden caves, picturesque villages, lush green nature and a capital – Palma – with a vibrant nightlife.

Go for a hike or hire a bike and cycle around the island to experience Mallorca’s beautiful nature and villages. Climb UNESCO world heritage site Serra de Tramuntana, the mountain range in the north west part of the island. Stop for a visit in Valdemossa, one of the more famous villages in the mountains.

Do you want to travel in even more comfort? You can always upgrade your SAS flight ticket to the next travel class. This gives you access to Fast Track, SAS Lounges, priority boarding and meals & snacks onboard.

Experience Spain with the kids. SAS offers up to 90% discounts on children’s tickets to make it more affordable to bring your kids on your trip to Mallorca, Barcelona, Madrid, Malaga, Alicante or Las Palmas.

Do you want to see the world? With Scandinavian Airlines you can fly to a lot of countries in the world. Our destinations

Always with SAS

At SAS, we strive to ensure our customers have a relaxed and comfortable journey. Regardless of which ticket type you carry, you’ll always enjoy certain SAS customer benefits.

Always included in your flight is easy online check-in, coffee and tea onboard, up to 90% price reduction for children and use of the SAS App.
